name: Road of Destiny
description: Horrors, logical puzzles and the atmosphere of the Soviet Union. This is all that awaits you in this game. Solve many tasks and logical puzzles to survive in a cruel world. If you are not afraid of adventures in the entourage of horror, then this quest is for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
